summary: The module defines a mixin class that augments a FastPitch text‑to‑speech model with a configurable set of adapter sub‑modules. It manages a dictionary of adapters, stores their configurations, and supplies methods to add, resolve, enable, and query adapters while enforcing correct input‑output dimensions and zero‑initialized residual connections.
business_intent: Enable flexible domain adaptation and fine‑tuning of FastPitch TTS models by attaching lightweight adapter layers without altering the core architecture.
